mapper.select: SELECT pay.payment_logs_no, pay.user_no, pay.create_date, pay.update_date, pay.payment_status, pay.prod_no, user.user_name, user.user_uuid, user.user_id, user.user_email, user.del_yn FROM tb_logs_payment pay LEFT JOIN tb_user_info user on user.user_no = pay.user_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_logs_payment (user_no, create_date, payment_status, transaction_id, prod_no, type) values (#{userNo}, now(), #{paymentStatus}, #{transactionId}, #{prodNo}, #{type})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_logs_payment paylog SET paylog.payment_status = #{paymentStatus}, paylog.update_date = now() WHERE paylog.user_no = #{userNo} AND paylog.transaction_id = #{transactionId}
